src:
Bez povrede za Boaćija
07 Nov 2019, 12:26 by Nemanja
Fudbaler Crvene zvezde Ričmond Boaći treniraće normalno sa ekipom uprkos što se požalio na povredu tokom jučerašnje utakmice sa Totenhemom u Ligi šampiona.
Boaći se oglasio na društvenoj mreži ,,instagram“, gde je naveo da nije doživeo povredu i da trenira u normalnom intenzitetu sa ekipom.
 – Dobro jutro svima. Dobro sam i nema ozbiljnijih problema, pa tako nastavljam da treniram normalno danas. Hvala svima koji su brinuli – napisao je Boaći.
Fudbaler iz Gane je dobio udarac, zbog čega je morao da napusti terenu u finišu utakmice, a s obzirom na to da je Milan Pavkov pre toga zadobio povredu, usled čega je završio utakmicu, postajala je bojazan da će Zvezda imati problema sa napadačima pred predstojeći vikend i duel sa Javorom.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
No injury to Boaci
07 Nov 2019, 12:26 by Nemanja
Red Star footballer Richmond Boaci will train normally with the team despite complaining of injury during yesterday's Champions League game with Tottenham.
Boacci appeared on the social network instagram, stating that he had not suffered an injury and was training in normal intensity with the team.
- Good morning to everyone. I'm fine and there are no more serious problems, so I continue to train normally today. Thank you to everyone who cared - Boaci wrote.
The Ghanaian footballer was hit, for which he had to leave the field in the finish of the game, and since Milan Pavkov had suffered an injury beforehand, ending the game, it became feared that the Star would have problems with the strikers before the upcoming weekend and a match with Javor.
